thread.title: RS Vimal lauds Dileep for his generous act!
thread.title_full: RS Vimal lauds Dileep for his generous act! - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: RS Vimal lauds Dileep for his generous act!
text:
In a recent interview, the director of Ennu Ninte Moideen, RS Vimal lauded the efforts of actor Dileep for lending a helping hand to Kanchanamala.
He said the team of Ennu Ninte Moideen had initially taken efforts to help Kanchanamala and to work on a building dedicated to Moideen. However, things went astray, and they got entangled in a legal tussle.
Vimal added that Dileep's generous act is indeed praiseworthy and more people should follow suit.
